title: WCGHK Website
desc: Developed a website for WCGHK using Next.js, Shadcn UI, TailwindCSS and integrated with Sanity CMS. The website is a corporate website for WCGHK.

title: Landor and Fitch Website
desc: Last project in Fitch. This is a one-page website using Next.js for development. Including number counting animation, smooth page scrolling etc.

title: ITC Mall Website
desc: Project in Fitch, first time for using Next.js on corporate website. Integrated with Umbraco CMS that work with back end developer.

title: Bird Meditation Website
desc: Project worked in Fitch. Developed new website for BIRD mediation company.

title: K11 Musea Website
desc: Main developer for the project in Fitch. Created more than 20 pages of template and components for cms integration.
